name: Street Circuit Racing 3D Extreme Speed Car Racers
name_original: Street Circuit Racing 3D Extreme Speed Car Racers
description:
The Street Circuit Racing is the best 3d arcade car racing game features wonderful realistic metropolitan city with day or night mode and six different camera views. Race for the desired number of laps assisted with back camera view mirror and win!

Key features;

* Beautiful 3D graphics of modern city roads,bridges & riverbed
* Switch between day & night mode during game play
* Custom choice of Steering, Stick, or Motion control for wheel and throttle
* Picture-in-Picture(PIP) 2D overview track map
* Continuous feed - car back camera view mirror
* Race Countdown
* 6 diff.camera views including front facing car view (Inside/Outside & Sky views)
* Collision fire sparks
* Unique and absorbing music tracks plus SFX/sound controls
* Amazingly small footprint of binary size for a 3D quality racing game.

Please note: This app requires powerful CPU based devices (dual core & above) to render 3D graphics.
